2025-07-30T11:02:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by Mainland Railway Authorities, High Speed Rail train service on 30 July 2025 travelling G100 from Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shanghai Hongqiao Station has been cancelled due to adverse weather conditions. Passengers may refer to MTRCL's High Speed Rail website and process your ticket refund within the time stated.
2025-07-30T11:02:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年07月30日由香港西九龍站前往上海虹橋站的高速鐵路列車車次G100取消。 乘客可參閱港鐵高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理退票。

2025-07-30T17:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that, as informed by Mainland Railway Authorities, High Speed Rail train service on 30 July 2025 travelling From Shanghai Hongqiao Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station G99 and From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Guangzhounan Station G6504 has been cancelled due to adverse weather conditions.
2025-07-30T17:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年07月30日由上海虹橋站前往香港西九龍站的高速鐵路列車車次G99及由香港西九龍站前往廣州南站的高速鐵路列車車次G6504取消。

2025-08-02T06:50:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-08-02T06:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

2025-08-02T09:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Red Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-08-02T09:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 紅色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Some entrances/exits of Hong Kong West Kowloon Station closed
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站部分出入口暫時關閉

2025-08-02T10:09:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that due to adverse weather conditions, Entrance/Exit C at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station is closed for preventive purpose. Please use other entrances/exits. 
High Speed Rail train service remains normal.
2025-08-02T10:09:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於天氣情況惡劣，香港西九龍站C出入口暫時關閉以作預防措施，請使用其他出入口。
高速鐵路服務維持正常。

2025-08-02T10:18:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that heavy rain is expected and preventative flooding measures are in place. The following entrances/exits are temporarily closed. 
For more details, please visit: https://www.td.gov.hk/en/special_news/spnews.htm.
2025-08-02T10:18:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於預料會有大雨，以下車站出入口暫時關閉以便作防護措施。
詳情請參看: https://www.td.gov.hk/tc/special_news/spnews.htm。

2025-08-02T10:40:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that heavy rain is expected and preventative flooding measures are in place. The following entrances/exits are temporarily closed. 
For more details, please visit: https://www.td.gov.hk/en/special_news/spnews.htm
Please use other entrances/exits.
2025-08-02T10:40:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於預料會有大雨，以下車站出入口暫時關閉以便作防護措施。
詳情請參看: https://www.td.gov.hk/tc/special_news/spnews.htm
請使用其他出入口。

2025-08-02T10:20:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to inclement weather , the following ferry service(s) will be or have been suspended. 
The last sailing is:
Coral Sea Ferry Service Company Limited
Kwun Tong to Sai Wan Ho: 10:18
Sai Wan Ho to Kwun Tong: 10:33
Sam Ka Tsuen to Sai Wan Ho: 10:30
Sai Wan Ho to Sam Ka Tsuen: 10:15.
2025-08-02T10:20:00.CONTENT_CN:
因惡劣天氣，以下渡輪服務將會或已經暫停服務。
尾班船如下：
珊瑚海船務有限公司
觀塘往西灣河:10:18
西灣河往觀塘:10:33
三家村往西灣河:10:30
西灣河往三家村:10:15。
